verses.verse: And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the shepherds <S%H7462><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> prophesy, <S%H5012><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to them, Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> to the shepherds; <S%H7462><s%> Woe <S%H1945><s%> be to the shepherds <S%H7462><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> that do feed <S%H7462><s%> themselves! should not the shepherds <S%H7462><s%> feed <S%H7462><s%> the flocks? <S%H6629><s%>

You eat <S%H398><s%> the fat, <S%H2459><s%> and you clothe <S%H3847><s%> you with the wool, <S%H6785><s%> you kill <S%H2076><s%> them that are fed: <S%H1277><s%> but you feed <S%H7462><s%> not the flock. <S%H6629><s%>

The diseased <S%H2456><s%> have you not strengthened, <S%H2388><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> have you healed <S%H7495><s%> that which was sick, <S%H2470><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> have you bound <S%H2280><s%> up that which was broken, <S%H7665><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> have you brought <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> that which was driven <S%H5080><s%> away, neither <S%H3808><s%> have you sought <S%H1245><s%> that which was lost; <S%H6><s%> but with force <S%H2394><s%> and with cruelty <S%H6531><s%> have you ruled <S%H7287><s%> them.

And they were scattered, <S%H6327><s%> because there is no <S%H1097><s%> shepherd: <S%H7462><s%> and they became <S%H1961><s%> meat <S%H402><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> when they were scattered. <S%H6327><s%>

My sheep <S%H6629><s%> wandered <S%H7686><s%> through all <S%H3605><s%> the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and on every <S%H3605><s%> high <S%H7311><s%> hill: <S%H1389><s%> yes, my flock <S%H6629><s%> was scattered <S%H6327><s%> on all <S%H3605><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> and none <S%H369><s%> did search <S%H1875><s%> or seek <S%H1245><s%> after them.
Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> you shepherds, <S%H7462><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%>

As I live, <S%H2416><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> surely <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> because <S%H3282><s%> my flock <S%H6629><s%> became <S%H1961><s%> a prey, <S%H957><s%> and my flock <S%H6629><s%> became <S%H1961><s%> meat <S%H402><s%> to every <S%H3605><s%> beast <S%H2416><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> because there was no <S%H369><s%> shepherd, <S%H7462><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> did my shepherds <S%H7462><s%> search <S%H1875><s%> for my flock, <S%H6629><s%> but the shepherds <S%H7462><s%> fed <S%H7462><s%> themselves, and fed <S%H7462><s%> not my flock; <S%H6629><s%>
Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> O you shepherds, <S%H7462><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I am against <S%H413><s%> the shepherds; <S%H7462><s%> and I will require <S%H1875><s%> my flock <S%H6629><s%> at their hand, <S%H3027><s%> and cause them to cease <S%H7673><s%> from feeding <S%H7462><s%> the flock; <S%H6629><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall the shepherds <S%H7462><s%> feed <S%H7462><s%> themselves <S%H853><s%> any more; <S%H5750><s%> for I will deliver <S%H5337><s%> my flock <S%H6629><s%> from their mouth, <S%H6310><s%> that they may not be meat <S%H402><s%> for them.

For thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I, even I, will both search <S%H1875><s%> my sheep, <S%H6629><s%> and seek <S%H1239><s%> them out.

As a shepherd <S%H7462><s%> seeks <S%H1243><s%> out his flock <S%H5739><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he is among <S%H8432><s%> his sheep <S%H6629><s%> that are scattered; <S%H6566><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> will I seek <S%H1239><s%> out my sheep, <S%H6629><s%> and will deliver <S%H5337><s%> them out of all <S%H3605><s%> places <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> they have been scattered <S%H6327><s%> in the cloudy <S%H6051><s%> and dark <S%H6205><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And I will bring <S%H3318><s%> them out from the people, <S%H5971><s%> and gather <S%H6908><s%> them from the countries, <S%H776><s%> and will bring <S%H935><s%> them to their own land, <S%H127><s%> and feed <S%H7462><s%> them on the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> by the rivers, <S%H650><s%> and in all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabited <S%H4186><s%> places of the country. <S%H776><s%>

I will feed <S%H7462><s%> them in a good <S%H2896><s%> pasture, <S%H4829><s%> and on the high <S%H4791><s%> mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall their fold <S%H5116><s%> be: there <S%H8033><s%> shall they lie <S%H7257><s%> in a good <S%H2896><s%> fold, <S%H5116><s%> and in a fat <S%H8082><s%> pasture <S%H4829><s%> shall they feed <S%H7462><s%> on the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
I will feed <S%H7462><s%> my flock, <S%H6629><s%> and I will cause them to lie <S%H7257><s%> down, <S%H7901><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

I will seek <S%H1245><s%> that which was lost, <S%H6><s%> and bring <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> that which was driven <S%H5080><s%> away, and will bind <S%H2280><s%> up that which was broken, <S%H7665><s%> and will strengthen <S%H2388><s%> that which was sick: <S%H2470><s%> but I will destroy <S%H8045><s%> the fat <S%H8082><s%> and the strong; <S%H2389><s%> I will feed <S%H7462><s%> them with judgment. <S%H4941><s%>

And as for you, O my flock, <S%H6629><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I judge <S%H8199><s%> between <S%H996><s%> cattle <S%H7716><s%> and cattle, <S%H7716><s%> between the rams <S%H352><s%> and the he goats. <S%H6260><s%>

Seems it a small <S%H4592><s%> thing to you to have eaten <S%H7462><s%> up the good <S%H2896><s%> pasture, <S%H4829><s%> but you must tread <S%H7429><s%> down with your feet <S%H7272><s%> the residue <S%H3499><s%> of your pastures? <S%H4829><s%> and to have drunk <S%H8354><s%> of the deep <S%H4950><s%> waters, <S%H4325><s%> but you must foul <S%H7515><s%> the residue <S%H3498><s%> with your feet? <S%H7272><s%>

And as for my flock, <S%H6629><s%> they eat <S%H7462><s%> that which you have trodden <S%H7429><s%> with your feet; <S%H7272><s%> and they drink <S%H8354><s%> that which you have fouled <S%H4833><s%> with your feet. <S%H7272><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> to them; Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I, even I, will judge <S%H8199><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the fat <S%H1277><s%> cattle <S%H7716><s%> and between <S%H996><s%> the lean <S%H7330><s%> cattle. <S%H7716><s%>

Because <S%H3282><s%> you have thrust <S%H1920><s%> with side <S%H6654><s%> and with shoulder, <S%H3802><s%> and pushed <S%H5055><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the diseased <S%H2456><s%> with your horns, <S%H7161><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> you have scattered <S%H6327><s%> them abroad; <S%H2351><s%>

Therefore will I save <S%H3467><s%> my flock, <S%H6629><s%> and they shall no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> be a prey; <S%H957><s%> and I will judge <S%H8199><s%> between <S%H996><s%> cattle <S%H7716><s%> and cattle. <S%H7716><s%>

And I will set <S%H6965><s%> up one <S%H259><s%> shepherd <S%H7462><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them, and he shall feed <S%H7462><s%> them, even <S%H853><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%> David; <S%H1732><s%> he shall feed <S%H7462><s%> them, and he shall be their shepherd. <S%H7462><s%>

And I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will be their God, <S%H430><s%> and my servant <S%H5650><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> a prince <S%H5387><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them; I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it.

And I will make <S%H3772><s%> with them a covenant <S%H1285><s%> of peace, <S%H7965><s%> and will cause the evil <S%H7451><s%> beasts <S%H2416><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%> out of the land: <S%H776><s%> and they shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> safely <S%H983><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and sleep <S%H3462><s%> in the woods. <S%H3264><s%>

And I will make <S%H5414><s%> them and the places round <S%H5439><s%> about my hill <S%H1389><s%> a blessing; <S%H1293><s%> and I will cause the shower <S%H1653><s%> to come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> in his season; <S%H6256><s%> there shall be showers <S%H1653><s%> of blessing. <S%H1293><s%>

And the tree <S%H6086><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> shall yield <S%H5414><s%> her fruit, <S%H6529><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> shall yield <S%H5414><s%> her increase, <S%H2981><s%> and they shall be safe <S%H983><s%> in their land, <S%H127><s%> and shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> when I have broken <S%H7665><s%> the bands <S%H4133><s%> of their yoke, <S%H5923><s%> and delivered <S%H5337><s%> them out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of those that served <S%H5647><s%> themselves of them.

And they shall no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> be a prey <S%H957><s%> to the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall the beast <S%H2416><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> devour <S%H398><s%> them; but they shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> safely, <S%H983><s%> and none <S%H369><s%> shall make them afraid. <S%H2729><s%>

And I will raise <S%H6965><s%> up for them a plant <S%H4302><s%> of renown, <S%H8034><s%> and they shall be no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> consumed <S%H622><s%> with hunger <S%H7457><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> bear <S%H5375><s%> the shame <S%H3639><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%> any more. <S%H5750><s%>

Thus shall they know <S%H3045><s%> that I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%> am with them, and that they, even the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> are my people, <S%H5971><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>
And you my flock, <S%H6629><s%> the flock <S%H6629><s%> of my pasture, <S%H4830><s%> are men, <S%H120><s%> and I am your God, <S%H430><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>
